00012 
00013 //  Comeau C++ compiler setup:
00014 
00015 #include "boost/config/compiler/common_edg.hpp"
00016 
00017 #if (__COMO_VERSION__ <= 4245) || !defined(BOOST_STRICT_CONFIG)
00018 
00019 #  ifdef _WIN32
00020 #     define BOOST_NO_SWPRINTF
00021 #  endif
00022 
00023 #  if defined(_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER <= 1300
00024 #     define BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE
00025 #     if _MSC_VER > 100
00026          // only set this in non-strict mode:
00027 #        define BOOST_NO_ARGUMENT_DEPENDENT_LOOKUP
00028 #     endif
00029 #  endif
00030 
00031 // Void returns don't work when emulating VC 6 (Peter Dimov)
00032 
00033 #  if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER == 1200)
00034 #     define BOOST_NO_VOID_RETURNS
00035 #  endif
00036 
00037 #endif  // version 4245
00038 
00039 //
00040 // enable __int64 support in VC emulation mode
00041 //
00042 #  if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1200)
00043 #     define BOOST_HAS_MS_INT64
00044 #  endif
00045 
00046 #define BOOST_COMPILER "Comeau compiler version " BOOST_STRINGIZE(__COMO_VERSION__)
00047 
00048 //
00049 // versions check:
00050 // we don't know Comeau prior to version 4245:
00051 #if __COMO_VERSION__ < 4245
00052 #  error "Compiler not configured - please reconfigure"
00053 #endif
00054 //
00055 // last known and checked version is 4245:
00056 #if (__COMO_VERSION__ > 4245)
00057 #  if defined(BOOST_ASSERT_CONFIG)
00058 #     error "Unknown compiler version - please run the configure tests and report the results"
00059 #  endif
00060 #endif
